item.title: How to embed a Shiny app in a Hugo website
item.description: Introduction If you have developed a Shiny app and would like to embed it on your Hugo website, follow these steps: create a new post as usual add runtime: shiny in the YAML metadata install the package “widgetframe” (install.packages("widgetframe")) load the package in the body of your new post (library(widgetframe)) insert the following code: # change URL with your URL <iframe height="800" width="100%" frameborder="no" src="https://antoinesoetewey.shinyapps.io/optimal-asset-allocation/"> </iframe> Here is an example with one of my Shiny app:
